refnamediv.refpurpose: Object for obtaining GPS time from gypsy-daemon

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: GypsyTime is used whenever the client program wishes to know about GPS time changes. It can report the current GPS time, and has a signal to notify listeners of changes.

A GypsyTime object is created with gypsy_time_new() using the D-Bus path of the GPS device. This path is returned from the gypsy_control_create() function. The client can then find out about the GPS time with gypsy_time_get_time().
As the GPS time information changes GypsyTime will emit the time-changed signal. This signal contains the GPS time of the most recent GPS update that it received.

refsect2.title: GypsyTime
refsect2.para: There are no public fields in GypsyTime.

refsect2.title: GYPSY_TIME_DBUS_SERVICE
refsect2.para: A define containing the address of the Time service

refsect2.title: GYPSY_TIME_DBUS_INTERFACE
refsect2.para: A define containing the name of the Time interface

refsect2.title: gypsy_time_new ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new GypsyTime object that listens for time changes from the GPS found at object_path.

listitem.simpara: Object path to the GPS device

refsect2.title: gypsy_time_get_time ()
refsect2.para: Obtains the current time, if known, from the GPS device.

listitem.simpara: TRUE on success, FALSE on error.
